HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Za narudžbe ukupnog iznosa većeg od 30,00 € DOSTAVA JE BESPLATNA za područje Hrvatske
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: u roku od 5 radnih dana od dana primitka narudžbe odnosno uplate (najčešće i ranije)

PARCEL_LOCKERS.free_delivery_limit: Za narudžbe ukupnog iznosa većeg od 30,00 € DOSTAVA JE BESPLATNA za područje Hrvatske

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery and parcel locker delivery are available in Croatia.
PROVIDERS: GLS for home delivery and BOX NOW for parcel lockers.
PRICING: Home delivery (GLS) costs 5,90 €. Parcel locker (BOX NOW) costs 3 €. Shipping is free for all orders over 30,00 €.
DELIVERY TIME: Standard delivery time is up to 5 business days.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Cash on delivery is not an available payment method. There is no information regarding express delivery, weekend delivery, or additional charges for island delivery.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is clearly stated within the 'Uvjeti poslovanja' (Terms of Service) page. The costs and providers for different delivery methods are well-defined. However, details about special delivery options (express, weekend, island) are missing.
